USE [Doordash]
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [MenuChange]
 AS
 SELECT
    [Id] AS [MenuChangeId],
    [Submarket],
    [District],
    [CustomStoreId] AS [RestaurantId],
    [MenuItemId],
    CAST([createdOn] AS DATETIMEOFFSET) AS [CreatedOn],
    [ChangeOperation],
    [Name],
    [Description],
    CASE
        WHEN [displayPrice] != '' OR [displayPrice] IS NOT NULL THEN CAST([displayPrice] AS MONEY)
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [CurrentDisplayPrice],
    CAST(JSON_VALUE([propertyChanges], '$[0].previousValue') AS MONEY) AS [PreviousDisplayPrice],
    [LoggingContainerName] AS [Category],
    [CustomRatingAverageRating] AS [AverageRating],
    [LoggingNumStarRating] AS [RatingCount],
    [RestaurantDetailPriceRangeDisplayString] AS [PriceRange],
    [RestaurantDetailBusinessTags] AS [BusinessTags]
 FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmos-keepapp;Database=doordash',
                OBJECT = 'menuchanges',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmos-keepapp'
)
WITH (
    [id] CHAR(36),
    [createdOn] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [changeOperation] VARCHAR(255) '$.changeOperation.value',
    [menuItemId] NVARCHAR(255),
    [name] NVARCHAR(255),
    [description] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [displayPrice] NVARCHAR(255),
    [loggingContainerName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [customRatingAverageRating] FLOAT,
    [customStoreId] BIGINT,
    [loggingNumStarRating] BIGINT,
    [restaurantDetailBusinessTags] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [restaurantDetailPriceRangeDisplayString] NVARCHAR(5),
    [propertyChanges] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [submarket] NVARCHAR(255),
    [district] NVARCHAR(255)
) AS [MenuChange]
GO

SELECT TOP 100 [tags].* FROM [MenuChange]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON([MenuChange].restaurantDetailBusinessTags, '$') WITH ([Name] NVARCHAR(255) '$.name') AS [tags]
